name: nostr-currency-publisher
description: Publishes currency exchange rates to Nostr relay

scripts.docker:up: docker run -d --name currency-publisher --restart unless-stopped --network host --env-file .env -e RELAY_URL=ws://localhost:8080 currency-publisher
scripts.docker:down: docker stop currency-publisher && docker rm currency-publisher
scripts.generate-key: node -e "const { generateSecretKey } = require('nostr-tools'); const { bytesToHex } = require('@noble/hashes/utils'); const sk = generateSecretKey(); console.log('Private Key (hex):', bytesToHex(sk)); console.log('Keep this secret and add to .env file!');"

author: Splitstr
